text: The 2011 Italian motorcycle Grand Prix was the eighth round of the 2011 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season. It took place on the weekend of 1–3 July 2011 at the Mugello Circuit. Jorge Lorenzo, Andrea Dovizioso and Casey Stoner, spraying the champagne on the podium after finishing first, second and third at the MotoGP race. ==MotoGP classification== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !
